Sentencas: A clean power generation system was built based on the steam co-gasification of biomass and coal in a quadruple fluidized bed gasifier.
Titulo: On a clean power generation system with the co-gasification of biomass and coal in a quadruple fluidized bed gasifier

Sentencas: The chemical looping with oxygen uncoupling technology was used to supply oxygen for the calciner.
Titulo: On a clean power generation system with the co-gasification of biomass and coal in a quadruple fluidized bed gasifier

Sentencas: The solid oxide fuel cell and the steam turbine were combined to generate power.
Titulo: On a clean power generation system with the co-gasification of biomass and coal in a quadruple fluidized bed gasifier

Sentencas: The calcium looping and mineral carbonation were used for CO2 capture and sequestration.
Titulo: On a clean power generation system with the co-gasification of biomass and coal in a quadruple fluidized bed gasifier

Sentencas: The aim of this work was to study the characteristics of this system.
Titulo: On a clean power generation system with the co-gasification of biomass and coal in a quadruple fluidized bed gasifier

Sentencas: The effects of key operation parameters on the system total energy efficiency (eta(ten)), total exergy efficiency (eta(tex)) and carbon sequestration rate (R-cs) were detected.
Titulo: On a clean power generation system with the co-gasification of biomass and coal in a quadruple fluidized bed gasifier

Sentencas: The energy and exergy balance calculations were implemented and the corresponding Sankey and Grassmann diagrams were drawn.
Titulo: On a clean power generation system with the co-gasification of biomass and coal in a quadruple fluidized bed gasifier

Sentencas: It was found that the maximum energy and exergy losses occurred in the steam turbine.
Titulo: On a clean power generation system with the co-gasification of biomass and coal in a quadruple fluidized bed gasifier

Sentencas: The system eta(ten) and eta(tex) could be similar to 50% and similar to 47%, and R-cs could be over unit.
Titulo: On a clean power generation system with the co-gasification of biomass and coal in a quadruple fluidized bed gasifier
